result.eng: I like to eat a big breakfast at the beginning of the day.
result.ga: Is maith liom bricfeasta mór a ithe ag tús an lae
result.orig: Is maith liom bricfeasta mór a ithe ag tús an lae
result.html: Is maith liom bricfeasta mór a ithe ag tús an laeI like to eat a big breakfast at the beginning of the day.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ liom bricfeasta mór a iṫe ag tús an laeI like to eat a big breakfast at the beginning of the day.

result.eng: The murder happened at the beginning of the chapter.
result.ga: Ag tús na caibidle a tharla an dúnmharú
result.orig: Ag tús na caibidle a tharla an dúnmharú
result.html: Ag tús na caibidle a tharla an dúnmharúThe murder happened at the beginning of the chapter.
result.ponchtml: Ag tús na caibidle a ṫarla an dúnṁarúThe murder happened at the beginning of the chapter.

result.eng: Read the word at the beginning of the sentence.
result.ga: Léigh an focal ag tús na habairte
result.orig: Léigh an focal ag tús na habairte
result.html: Léigh an focal ag tús na habairteRead the word at the beginning of the sentence.
result.ponchtml: Léiġ an focal ag tús na habairteRead the word at the beginning of the sentence.

result.eng: You will find the table of contents at the beginning of the book.
result.ga: Gheobhaidh tú clár na n-ábhar ag tús an leabhair
result.orig: Gheobhaidh tú clár na n-ábhar ag tús an leabhair

result.ponchtml: Ġeoḃaiḋ tú clár na n-áḃar ag tús an leaḃairYou will find the table of contents at the beginning of the book.

result.eng: It happened at the beginning of the year.
result.ga: Tharla sé ag tús na bliana
result.orig: Tharla sé ag tús na bliana
result.html: Tharla sé ag tús na blianaIt happened at the beginning of the year.
result.ponchtml: Ṫarla sé ag tús na blianaIt happened at the beginning of the year.

result.html: Tosaigh ag an túsStart at the beginning.
result.ponchtml: Tosaiġ ag an túsStart at the beginning.

result.html: Tá an obair ag tosúThe work is beginning.

result.html: Bíonn gach tosach lagEvery beginning is weak.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn gaċ tosaċ lagEvery beginning is weak.

result.eng: Black people have been in America since the beginning.
result.ga: Tá Gormaigh i Meiriceá ón tús
